body.name: Evolur Santa Fe 5-in-1 Convertible Crib in Antique Brown, Greenguard Gold Certified, Features 3 Mattress Heights, Wooden Nursery and Bedroom Furniture, Baby Crib
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 6 hrs 20 mins
features: INSPIRED BY THE SOUTHWEST - Earthy and elegant, the Santa Fe 5-in-1 Convertible Crib features a full panel headboard, subtle dentil molding, gentle arch accents, and imperial feet; The crib is crafted out of kiln-dried hardwood with fine veneers

5-in-1 CONVERTIBILITY - The Santa Fe converts to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed; Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed; It also features 3 mattress height settings

TIMELESS FINISHES - The Santa Fe is available in three classy finishes - a warm Antique Brown finish and contemporary Antique Mist and Storm Gray finishes; Along with the Santa Fe's gender-neutral form, they are perfect for a boy or girl nursery

SAFETY FIRST - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA, and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations

A LIFETIME INVESTMENT - Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Santa Fe Collection like the Double Dresser, Tall Chest, Nightstand, and Hutch to create a timeless nursery; Crib dimensions are 56.75″ L x 31.25″ W x 47.00″ H and weighs 70.5 lbs
body.description: Inspired by the warmth of the Southwest, the Santa Fe 5-in-1 Convertible Crib has an earthy elegance to it! With a full panel headboard that showcases subtle dentil molding and graceful arches, the Santa Fe has a gender-neutral appeal that makes it perfect for a boy or girl nursery. And oh, don't miss out the imperial style designer feet! Constructed out of kiln-dried hardwood with hardwood veneers, the Santa is built to last and is truly a lifetime investment. Another feature of the Santa Fe is the hidden hardware. We believe in creating furniture that evolves with your growing child. The Santa Fe 5-in-1 Convertible Crib does exactly that. The Santa Fe features 3 mattress height settings that can be adjusted depending on your child. Set it at its highest setting during the newborn months and lower it as your child starts to pull up and stand. It converts to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed. Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed. The Santa Fe is available in three sophisticated finishes - Antique Brown, Antique Mist, and Storm Gray. At Evolur, safety is always our No.1 priority - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA, and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations. Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Santa Fe Collection like the Double Dresser, Tall Chest, Hutch, and Nightstand to create a timeless nursery. Crib dimensions are 56.75″ L x 31.25″ W x 47.00″ H and weighs 70.5 lbs. For the best mattress fit, we recommend any Dream on Me or Evolur standard, full-size, non-toxic, Greenguard certified crib mattress (sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, beautiful color, very happy with the result!
reviews.reviewText: I looked for MONTHS for a crib that would work in our son’s nursery and fell in love with this one! I wanted something that would be able to grow with our son and would be appropriate to use in his room as he grows into a young man and I think this crib is perfect for that!We chose the Antique Brown. The color is a rich dark brown and I love that it has some character in the wood tone. It’s made very well and the carvings in the wood make it feel like an expensive piece.My husband was able to put this crib together by himself in one night with no complaints and I was able to adjust the mattress position by myself once our son began to stand.Overall, I’m very happy with our purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, but watch the steps.
reviews.reviewText: My husband personally did not read the instructions and struggled putting the crib together. If you’re familiar with evolur they’re normally very easy. Once he read the instructions, it was beautiful once completed. Box came damaged, and only one tiny scuff was on the crib. Other than that, beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this crib. Sturdy, easy assembly, color is great. Only complaint, some warning stickers were visible and a pain to get off. Otherwise, 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars TWO damaged cribs in a row
reviews.reviewText: We received the first crib as a baby registry item. The main front and back sections were cracked down the middle like someone tried to fold them like playing cards.The second one had several shards of plastic "trim" pieces broken off the main headboard in the box, as well as some white fuzz on one of the joints that looked like cobwebs/mold.We are returning this second one as well and just buying one from a local store.The crib would look nice, if it came whole. Overall I'm not impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Finally Received an Undamaged Crib
reviews.reviewText: We ended up having to return the crib twice because the first two we received were cracked and unusable. The third crib came all in one piece. The only reason I’m giving four stars is because there were still some scratches on the footboard and headboard when it arrived but not bad enough for us to return it. It is really beautiful and looks great in our nursery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems VERY sturdy! Color matched exactly as pictured (antique brown)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The crib itself is beautiful color and good quality. Amazons shipping is quick easy and worry free which is a huge added bonus!
